name: Pool Cats
description:
POOL CATS

The cool cats went to the pool.
Can you spot clon? What about the queen?
Good job, now do it faster!

Anyone can get a bronze trophy, but can you get a silver, or even a golden one?

I made this little spotting game for the #clontest in hopes of becoming a cool cat myself, but even if I don't win, I still had fun making it and I hope you enjoy playing it too!

How to play:

Find and click on the cat shown in the top right before the time runs out. Watch out, the game gets faster and faster each time!

Depending on how well you do you will either get a bronze, silver or golden trophy.


W❤TC
